title: Works auto-magically
text: A great tool in the security belt

title: Useless
text: Until the most recent iOS update I was able to log into my Microsoft Outlook work email account without any issues. Now, every time I attempt to login it pulls up the authentication app I receive an error stating my sign in was successful but does not meet the criteria to access this resource. I do not know what this means but the issue is I can no access my work email. I’m hoping this a software update bug that will be resolved soon. You cannot access this right now Your sign-in was successful but does not meet the criteria to access this resource. For example, you might be signing in from a browser, app, or location that is restricted by your admin. I recently found out from a colleague that my company’s IT people purposely restricted our access to check email outside of work for security reasons. It isn’t a software bug but was done by design. Prior to this change the app seemed to function normally.

title: What? Microsoft! Awesome? NOT!
text: How could you be so embolden to steal what you have stolen! I thought my final years were going to be golden! Why is Microsoft so beholden to scammers? They aught to be put in the slammer not given a hammer by Microsoft to rip US all off!

title: Confused
text: How is it I need an Authenticator app to login to the Authenticator app. This makes no sense.

title: Peace of Mind
text: The Microsoft Authenticator app has been a safe way to utilize multifactor authentication.

title: Great
text: I love it, easy to use.

title: I like the convenience BUT
text: I switched to a new iPhone and it has been a bear. Granted I could have searched YouTube for help but wanted to see how intuitive it was to figure out what I was doing wrong. A short script when installing/transferring on new phone would be great. It just so happened I did not factory reset my new phone. A short dialog like “Is this a new device”. And then go on to say “you will need to restore backup from old device registration first”. Something like that

title: Restoring Work Accounts
text: Need a better way to restore work accounts
